p: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) uses the ACE 2 as a receptor for host cell entry. A recent publication suggested that the ACE2 gene is demethylated and overexpressed in T cells from patients with SLE compared with healthy controls. 4 Data on ACE2 expression in pulmonary epithelial cells of patients with SLE or on ACE2 gene polymorphisms in this population are lacking.
